title: Paul O'Grady: For the Love of Animals - India
overview: In this new two-part series, Paul O'Grady heads to India for the first time in his life, to rescue and rehabilitate some of the country's vulnerable wild animals and experience the jobs of the keepers and conservationists who are looking after them.Filming at various locations across India, Paul meets extraordinary animals - old and young â€“ who are in desperate need of care, both within sanctuaries and in their natural environments.
